title: Making a Murderer appeal: Should court toss Brendan Dassey conviction?
itunes:title: Making a Murderer appeal: Should court toss Brendan Dassey conviction?
description:
The Netflix Making a Murderer docu-series convinced many that Steven Avery's nephew Brendan Dassey's confession should be tossed and his murder conviction overturned. Nancy Grace debates the case with Det. Tom Fassbender, who received Dassey's confession, defense lawyer Vinoo Varghese, and reporter John Lee.



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
